name: Hector The Cat - Treasure Hunter
description:
You play Hector the Cat a Treasure Hunter.
Explore Silver Island 's Dungeons to gather as many Treasure as you Can and become the Best Treasure Hunter.

Gameplay:
- Run are short ( < 45 mn) and Last 10 days
- For each run Maps and Dungeons are randomly generated
- Dungeons are rated from 1 stars to 3 stars related to their difficulty
- Switch Between Guns and Sword to adapt fighting situation
- Improve your competence or buy new one when Lvl UP;
- Construct the adapt Build ( Sword/Gun/Magic) to evolve;
- Buy specific armor and consumable to improve your chance to defeat Boss and succeed the most difficult dungeon
- You get a rank in accordance with you skill at the end of each run.
- Die and retry to improve your skills

Could you be the best Hunter and get the S rank ?
